<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Store energy prices used for cost calculations within the platform","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["validFrom","validTo","price"],"properties":{"validFrom":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-09-15T10:00:00Z","description":"From when is price valid (only hours are used, minutes and seconds are omitted)"},"validTo":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-09-15T11:00:00Z","description":"Until when prices is valid (only hours are used, minutes and seconds are omitted)"},"price":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Energy price in Euro/MWh"}},"title":"EnergyPrice"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
